RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 52. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 121 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000, if for $14,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHASIN' WHISKEY was away alertly to set a pressured pace in the two path, then was on the inside on the turn and dug in gamely in the drive, then held sway late to prove best under a drive. SHELTRFROMTHESTORM after a half a step slow moved up and was between rivals and had to steady by the half mile marker, then saved ground on the turn, finished well on the inside to gain the place award. CLEVER TIGER tracked the pace along the inside early but checked leaving the half mile marker and dropped back to trail the field entering the turn, saved ground on the turn, angled out to the far outside leaving the three sixteenths and closed fast late, gained show award. BRIGHT PATH chased the early pace from between rivals, steadied slightly by the seven sixteenths, then advanced three to four wide by the quarter pole, finished willingly but needed more late. BIG SMILE broke in and bumped a rival at the start, then pressed the pace three wide early, made a bid between rivals at the quarter pole but flattened out in the final furlong. WORK FROM HOME was bumped at the start, then advanced on the outside to track the pace five wide, made a three wide bid nearing the quarter pole, but faded the final furlong. PLUOT stalked the early pace four wide, then dropped back three wide on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Sheltrfromthestorm
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadied between rivals 1/2, saved ground turn, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Bright Path
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased between horses, steadied 7/16, came 4 wide, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Tiger
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, checked 1/2, dropped back, angled out,closed

ENTRY.NAME: Chasin' Whiskey
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, dug in stretch, held sway late

ENTRY.NAME: Work From Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, tracked 5 wide, bid 3 wide 1/4, faded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Big Smile
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, bumped rival, pressed pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Pluot
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, 3 wide turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since September 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COSMOLOGICAL was well placed on the inside, split rivals leaving the turn while making a bid, then drew clear to prove best, driving. SCOREBOARD LILY was allowed to settle early three wide, came five wide into the lane and finished well. JUST ADD MOONLIGHT stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn but flattened out the final furlong. JUSTICE OR APPEAL dueled for the lead and made a two wide bid on the turn to gain a short lead nearing the quarter pole, but faded the final furlong. ANGELOFTHEGALAXY was allowed to settle early on the inside, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. THUNDER BOSS dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Thunder Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Cosmological
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, split rivals upper, bid, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Add Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Justice Or Appeal
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid 2 wide turn, faded 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Angelofthegalaxy
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Scoreboard Lily
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle 3 wide, came 5 wide upper stretch, rallied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 10000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 29. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONGTAIL dueled for the lead two wide, made a bid on the turn to take over and shake clear, then widened the margin off the turn and drew out to prove much the best under a drive. COAST TO COAST was well placed early, made a three wide bid on the turn, but proved to be no match for the winner, clearly second best. GREAT WORKOUT was settled early, dropped to the inside on the turn and had a mild late rally to gain the show award. HE'S A SHOOTER bobbled at the start, prompted the pace three wide, fell back on the turn and dropped to the inside by the quarter pole and weakened. MANAHAWKIN was off a step slow, then passed the tiring rivals. BOYS OF QUEENS was reluctant to load, settled early, five wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. BAVARIA dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened. PECOS BILL failed to menace. YOUSHOULDBESOLUCKY was reserved early, came wide into the lane and was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Coast to Coast
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, bid 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Boys of Queens
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, allowed to settle, 5 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Youshouldbesolucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, came wide upper stretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Bavaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Pecos Bill
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Longtail
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, bid turn, drew clear, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich III & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: Manahawkin
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Great Workout
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, mild rally,

ENTRY.NAME: He's a Shooter
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, prompted 3 wide, inside turn, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since October 29 Allowed 2 lbs. A R ace Since September 29 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STASSI stalked the early pace, made a three wide bid on the turn, then slowly edged away in the final furlong to prove best under a drive. COULD BE A COUGAR set the early pace two wide, then dueled with the winner by the quarter pole but could not match strides with that rival late, saved place award. CHAPA stalked the early pace and made a four wide bid by the quarter pole but hung in the lane, needed more. ARROGANTE was off a step slow, chased the pace three wide on the turn but had no late kick in the drive. HIDDEN CACHE was well placed early on the inside and faded. FREYDIS was off a step slow, came six wide into the lane and had no serious rally. MORGANS COVE chased the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Freydis
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, came 6 wide upper stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Stassi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, bid 3 wide, edged away, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Cache
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Could Be a Cougar
ENTRY.OWNER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC Micovic Daniel and Offutt Brett
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace 2 wide, dueled 1/4, no match late, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: Arrogante
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, 3 wide turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Morgans Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, inside turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Chapa
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace outside, bid 4 wide, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 90. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS SINCE NOVEMBER 29, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Octo ber 29 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since September 29 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COOL COMEDIAN dawdled along on the inside early, drew clear on the turn, then remained clear to the wire to prove best under a drive. HANALEI'S HOUDINI was rated early between rivals, dropped to the inside on the far turn and chased the winner, tipped out leaving the turn and finished willingly, second best. ONCE A GIANT was allowed to settle early, advanced three wide on the turn, came four wide into the lane and was along for the show award late. CAERUS prompted the pace three wide, then pressed the pace two wide on the backstretch, then chased the winner on the turn and faded, lost show award late. BUCK WILD was off slowly, reserved on the inside, came into the lane four wide and angled out to the outside and had no serious rally. SANTO was four wide into the first turn, tracked the pace on the outside and tired. JACKIE A was well placed early on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Buck Wild
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, reserved inside, angled out stretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie A
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Once a Giant
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 4 wide upper stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Santo
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, tracked pace outside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Comedian
ENTRY.COMMENT: dawdled along inside, drew clear turn, kept clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Caerus
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 3 wide, chased turn, faded, lost 3rd late

ENTRY.NAME: Hanalei's Houdini
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated between horses, inside 2nd turn, tipped out, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 10800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since October 29 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANTANKEROUS CAT set the pace on the inside and was well handled throughout, sent down leaving the turn and remained clear to prove best. MONEY MAKING KAZ tracked the winner three wide throughout, finished willingly but could not get to the winner, second best. BUSHWICK BRUISER was four wide on the first turn, reserved early, advanced three wide on the turn and came four wide into the lane and had a mild late kick. LUDO was settled early, two wide on the turn but lacked the needed rally. DISCREETLY THRIFTY was reserved early on the inside and had no rally. GREATEST WARRIOR was away alertly to be close up early on the rail, then tired on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Discreetly Thrifty
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, inside turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Money Making Kaz
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked winner, 3-2 wide, finished willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Bushwick Bruiser
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, reserved, 3 wide 2nd turn, came 4 wide, mildly

ENTRY.NAME: Greatest Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, close up inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Ludo
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 2 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Cantankerous Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, well handled, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 123 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAKE A SPLASH tracked the early pace and made a two wide bid and took over at the three eights marker, drew clear on the turn and then drew off in the drive while being kept to left handed crop urging to prove much the best. DIXIE MUSIC chased the early pace on the inside, made a bid two to three wide nearing the quarter pole, but proved to be no match for the winner, clearly second best. DUSTED was settled early on the inside, then made a mild bid four wide by the quarter pole and then lacked a late response, bested rest. WILD N' SASSY was allowed to settle early, four wide by the quarter pole and had no rally. CAUSE I'M ELEGANT was five wide into the first turn, chased the pace four wide, then was three wide on the far turn and tired. MISS MIA LIA had an outside pursuit early, then dropped back and moved to be three wide on the turn, then dropped to the inside in the lane while being no threat. HERE WE GO AGAIN set the early pace while clear, then stopped after five furlongs. DANCEWITHTHEBAND checked after the start, then was guided to the outside and was far back, showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Dancewiththeband
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked after stopped, showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Dusted
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, mild bid 4 wide 1/4, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Dixie Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, bid 3 wide 1/4, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Here We Go Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace, stopped after five furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Wild n' Sassy
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/4 pole, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Make a Splash
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, clear 1/4, drew off, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Wasabi Ventures Stables LLC,Greenspring Mares LLC & Craig

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mia Lia
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside pursuit, 3 wide 1/4 pole, inside stretch, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Cause I'm Elegant
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, chased pace 4 wide, 3 wide 2nd turn, tired
